name: e-commerce-shopping-clothing
description: This is a simple clothing shopping store Application that allows users to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) products. The application interacts with a local API and performs operations such as adding new products, viewing a list of products, editing product details, and deleting products. ## Features Add Product: Submit a new product with name, price, and color. View Products: View a list of all products fetched from the API. Edit Product: Update the details of an e ## set up instruction Install JSON Server globally by running: npm install -g json-server ## step  to run clone the repository
